timeline.bodyText: @hamiltonha Do we have guidance on including pointers to docs URLs in error messages? Do we need to create a go.microsoft or aka.ms URL for it?

replies.bodyText: Also, using concatenation is far more efficient than String.format, which we should probably avoid whenever feasible.
